p: Most common extracts or compounds isolated from Siberian Ginseng ( Eleutherococcus senticosus), Schisandra ( S. chinensis), Ginseng ( Panax ginseng), and Golden Root ( R. rosea) have been studied. All adaptogenic plants and preparations from them have been clinically tested and approved before incorporation into official medical practice.
